snippet.title: House of Usher (Crystalware) for the Atari 8-bit family
snippet.description:
Came also out for:

---


Game description:

House of Usher is an adventure game, where you have to explore a huge house...

Be aware of monsters, animals and random stuff. 


What I think:

It is almost a good game, but sometimes monsters have way too many hitpoints (and I am talking here of the beginning of the game!), the fights are so slow and everything is so delayed that they feel almost turn-based-like and not like realtime fights and there are too many random objects that can take away your health.

Still, exploring the house is quite fun and every room is an adventure on its own.
